Look for Oedema:
 ∙ Oedema (swelling), which appears in the evening and 
disappears in the morning after a full night’s sleep, could 
be a normal manifestation of pregnancy.
 ∙ Any oedema of the face, hands, abdominal wall, and 
vulva is abnormal. Oedema can be suspected if a woman 
complains of abnormal tightening of any rings on her 
fingers.
